description:

She's fucked a few, so it wasn't a complete desert, but not the multitudes she craved. Quenching her insatiable need for cock, meant she became an escort to solve the problem. No word of a lie, and now she gets fucked seven days a week. Sorted.
Despite getting fucked so much, she finds it a bit tricky to get fucked just the way she likes it. The lady likes it a bit rough and most gentlemen are exactly that â€“ gentlemen; men who, despite the pleas of attractive young women to grab them by the throat and slap their flushed cheeks hard, find themselves retreating in apology and confusion at such a declaration. Which is, of course, very heart-warming but a useless waste to Miss Filth. No, what Classy needs is a total cunt.
Luckily, we have the very man. Arise, Dr. P!
title: Classy: "Do Whatever You Want With Me"
